projectDescription: Machine learning project that predicts the gender of an OkCupid dating profile based on different profile prompt question responses using the Naive Bayes algorithm.
Demonstrates exploratory data analysis skills using data from world energy. Utilizes Python and Shiny to create a simple data driven application.
Demonstrates basics of web frameworks in a front-end focus using Blazor and C#. Utilizes Razor components and ability to deploy a simple application.
Demonstrates basic programming skills in Python. Utilizes the libraries Requests, NumPy and BeautifulSoup to collect data and output to usable formats.
Demonstrates basic web development skills including HTML, CSS and JavaScript in a static web app. Utilizes Bootstrap styling and demonstrates knowledge of git version control
